alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Madison (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 2:25PM CDT until June 25 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Madison County in northwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Franklin County in west central Arkansas... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 225 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Saint Paul, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... St. Paul... Saint Paul... Pettigrew... Dutton... Brashears... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
